name: The Samurai
description:
The Samurai long ago abolished all other existing samurai warriors. He promoted himself as the one and only samurai. Over time his brutal crimes have grown exponentially more devastating. 

The once noble ranks of the castle have become ignoble, presumably from fear of the samurai, otherwise known as The Untouchable. The kingdom is in desperate need of a saviour, are you the one the people are waiting for?

The Samurai offers a diversified experience and challenge for the player using random generation each round. With combat and item generation inspired from games such as Diablo and Path of Exile.
